name: The Walls Have Ears (juliaheinrich, Deep_Danny, Elliduewel)
name_original: The Walls Have Ears (juliaheinrich, Deep_Danny, Elliduewel)
description: Its 1987 - Germany is torn apart. Two Nations, one City. Berlin marks the central of both countries. But one of them takes separation more strictly than the other. In the middle of East Berlin young Franz Adden is looking for his walkman but what he finds in the seemingly safe living room turns this warm autumn day and his whole life upside down.
